revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetUserArrayFloat}} '''A_SetUserArrayFloat''' (string ''name'', int ''index'', float ''value'')
Sets the calling actor's [[user array]] of type '''float''' named ''name'', at position ''index'', to ''value''. The name must begin with {{c|user_}}.
User arrays are not used by anything internally, contrarily to the args array and the special1 and special2 fields.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also == * [[A_SetUserArray]] * [[A_SetUserVar]] * [[A_SetUserVarFloat]] * [[GetUserArray]] * [[GetUserVariable]] * [[SetUserArray]] * [[SetUserVariable]]
{{DEFAULTSORT:SetUserArray}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
